title: Klipfolio
description: Klipfolio is the new way everyday people and their teams make informed decisions, backed by data. Klipfolio is a data analytics cloud app for building and sharing real-time business dashboards and reports on web browsers, TV monitors and mobile devices. Klipfolio helps you stay in-the-know and in control of your business by giving you visibility into the KPIs and metrics that matter most.
